content: these wee frogs fit in the palm of your hand they re only about 6 5 to 7cm tall under 3in if you make them using dk yarn and a 3 5mm hook if you do make one of these frogs please tag me on instagram @okaytocrochet - i d love to see your finished makes hope you have fun making your own mini frog buddies what you will need yarn hook stuffing yarn needle to sew the eyes to the body and to make french knots for the eyes
